item.description: Why is exposure to full-spectrum lighting important? Evidence suggests that it can promote a healthy, normal sleep/wake cycle. In recent research, this light was found to help some older adults sleep through the night. Other studies indicate that it may assist in improving sleep and learning ability in adolesence. Join Gary Domurad, Internationally Certified Wellness Consultant and Nikken Representative as he explains and demonstrates the importance and many benefits of Full Spectrum Lighting and how it can improve you life! This is a FREE class so call The HSCC to reserve your spot today!

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: FREE ~ The Bright Side of Full Spectrum Lighting w/ Gary Domurad
